It is eclipse 3.1 and AJDT 1.3.0 RC1
I have updated the FAQ for 1.2.1 and 1.3.  Hopefully we will be able to fix this in the 1.4 timeframe.  In the meantime Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V should work.

I get the following exception trying to move aspects between packages (does not have to be default) in 1.4. Mighty annoying.
